‚ÑπÔ∏èOverview

This Privacy Policy applies to the mobile application "RateShare" developed and published by Kannaiyan ("we," "us," or "our"). This application is experimental in nature and provided for educational and testing purposes only.

üö´Information We DO NOT Collect

üîí We prioritize your privacy by NOT collecting any of the following:
  • Personal identification information
  • Email addresses or contact information
  • Location data or GPS coordinates
  • Device identifiers or advertising IDs
  • Biometric data
  • Financial or payment information
  • Social media profiles or contacts
  • Photos, videos, or media files
  • Browsing history or web activity
  • Third-party app usage data

üìäInformation We MAY Collect

üìä Only anonymous, non-personal data for app improvement:
  • Basic app usage analytics (anonymous)
  • Crash reports and error logs (no personal data)
  • General device information (OS version, device type)
  • App performance metrics

üîßHow We Use Information

Any information collected is used solely for:

  • Improving app performance and stability
  • Fixing bugs and technical issues
  • Understanding general usage patterns
  • Ensuring app security and functionality

üîíData Sharing

We do NOT engage in any of the following practices:
  • Sell your data
  • Share data with advertisers
  • Provide data to third-party marketers
  • Use data for targeted advertising
  • Share data with social media platforms
  • Sell user profiles or behavioral data
